segments.text: Oh, this brings back memories of my childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on the stool, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, just like I used to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share, it's so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, it's all part of the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she used to do the same thing when she was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is a bit worrying, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip and fall, that would ruin all the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just full of childhood memories and excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR
